posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


Our client, a distinguished collector of mid-grade tobacco cards,
has asked us to help him procure the following items.

If you have any of the cards listed below for sale. please write in confidence
to   bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com




Cards Need ( PSA 5 or PSA 6 only NQ)


T201
Bresnahan / Huggins
Bridwell / Mathewson
Falkenberg / Lajoie
Gardner / Speaker
 
T202
SPEAKER ROUNDING THIRD SPEAKER/WOOD
SPEAKER SCORES ENGLE/SPEAKER

Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com

Posted By: barrysloate
Did he actually use the word "procure?"

Posted By: JP
I think he said "get" and Bruce said "Huh?"

So he followed up with "acquire" and Bruce replied, "Pardon?"

Then he finished with "acquire" and Bruce responded, "Hark! You must mean 'procure'. "

Posted By: JP
